title: Top lane wouldn't have an issue against ranged champs if doran shield didn't suck.
body:
Like a top laner buying {{item:2033}}, recalling into {{item:1082}} would outsustain every top laner lol.

All tanks have top is grasp, but then they get auto attacked 3 times and ignited, so essentially the grasp did nothing but bait them into dying.
Same with aftershock, but then minions hit you too, and then u get bursted when the aftershock wears off XD

Meanwhile their aery or whatever rune they chose did 3x the damage of yours, and all you came out with was missing half of your CS, and 4 hp gained from grasp lol

So what if ADC's are buying it? It's within reason because everyone's 1 shotting them too. lol
